name: U.S. DURUM GROWERS ASSOCIATION
description: Trade association representing the interests of U.S. durum producers.
sampleDescriptions: Trade matters involving U.S. durum wheat, federal crop insurance issues and durum, and federal grading standards affecting durum.
Trade matters involving U.S. durum wheat, federal crop insurance issues and durum, and federal grading standards affecting durum.
Advocate for equal treatment of wheat and durum grading standards and trade between the U.S. and Canada and work for their inclusion in the U.S.-Mexico-Canada trade agreement.
